subtask.title: Ticket Classification Logic Development
subtask.objective: Implement NLP-based ticket categorization using the QWEN3 model.
subtask.scope: Train/define prompts for IT-related categories (device troubleshooting, software issues, etc.), and integrate confidence scoring for escalation decisions.

verification.completion_summary: Research focused on LLM optimization techniques and deployment strategies but did not explicitly address ticket categorization prompt development, confidence scoring integration, or IT-specific category implementation using QWEN3.

covered_aspects: LLM fine-tuning and prompt engineering methodologies
missing_aspects: Specific IT ticket category prompt development (device troubleshooting, software issues)
Confidence scoring implementation for escalation decisions

missing_requirements: Explicit documentation of IT ticket categorization prompts
Implementation details for confidence scoring mechanisms
